skills.skill: Hadoop Stack (HDFS, Hive, Spark, Streaming, HBase, Kafka, Oozie, NiFi)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage, analyze, and transform data to actionable intelligence for AI and Data Organization.
Design, build, and implement data pipelines, analytics, and data tools for automation and accessibility.
Support marketing-related projects on Big Data/Cloud platform, including new applications design and training other developers.
Identify and implement data security, quality, and process automation solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to source new data, develop schema requirements, and maintain metadata.
Use large data sets to address business issues and discover tasks that can be automated.
Design and implement fact tables, reports, and dashboards using Tableau, Looker, and other tools.
Analyze existing Teradata/ SQL queries for performance improvement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or four or more years of work experience in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related technical discipline.
Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems and / or related technical discipline (optional)
